itunes:title: Episode 525 - Live From The Army/Navy Tailgate!
title: Episode 525 - Live From The Army/Navy Tailgate!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg live from the best rivalry in college football as the boys do jello shots with strangers, welcome random veterans to sit in and share their exp...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg live from the best rivalry in college football as the boys do jello shots with strangers, welcome random veterans to sit in and share their experiences, and Jarred gets challenged by a homeless man live on air to shotgun a beer. Special thank you to the Drinkin' Bros PA Chapter for a wild show!

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
